1207479809548472320.text: Their behavior over the last three years is the very behavior the Founding Fathers warned us about. Fortunately, I have no doubt that the American people recognize Democrats’ antics, and they will not easily forget. Today is truly a sad day for justice.

1207479808415948800.text: Impeachment is one of the most serious acts that Congress will undertake, it should not be taken lightly or used to strong arm those you disagree with politically. It’s irresponsible that the Democrats have weaponized the impeachment process to appease their voting base.

1207479807237394432.text: The Constitution is clear — treason, bribery, or high crimes and misdemeanors are impeachable offenses. The evidence presented does not meet those standards required by the supreme law of the land.

1207479806083903490.text: with the Ukraine President even occurred. The last month of impeachment hearings have been political theatre designed to present hearsay and rumors as facts. Make no mistake, today’s vote isn’t about justice, or upholding the rule of law, this is politics.

1207479805005979649.text: While the Democrats try to rewrite their history, the truth is that the impeachment of President Trump began the day he was inaugurated. In fact, 17 of the 24 Democratic members on the House Judiciary Committee voted to impeach President Trump well before the phone call

1207479803865182210.text: The evidence presented by the House Majority in this case was hearsay. In fact, the most substantial direct evidence was the transcript of the President’s telephone call, which did not prove an impeachable offense.

1207479802782998530.text: This entire impeachment process has lacked impartiality, respect for the Constitution and justice. When I was on the bench, I instructed every jury the same way. I told them, “what someone heard from another source other than what they directly observed is not evidence.”

1207479801587666946.text: It is a fundamental ideal of our republic that every American receives justice under the law. As a Member of Congress, we are required to uphold that ideal & as a former judge, I was tasked with the same responsibility.

1207327734709604358.text: Democrats will try to rewrite their history, but the truth is, they've been trying to impeach President Trump since the day he was inaugurated. https://t.co/pQYK5U6sci

1143966686225326081.text: Meanwhile, the Senate just passed a bipartisan bill, that can become law, to address the humanitarian crisis at the border. I urge Speaker Pelosi to bring this legislation to the floor ASAP, so we can give the agencies the resources they need to take care of these children.

1143966685306740736.text: Now Democrats (after a month of obstructing) put forth a bill containing poison pills that they know won't pass, because they'd rather play politics then fix the situation.

1143966684295979010.text: The conditions at the border are declining because agencies are stretched to their limits with the influx we are experiencing now. Health and Human Services is overwhelmed and begging for resources. But for an entire month, House Democrats refused to act.

1143966682949586945.text:
Dems finally offered their own bill this week- a partisan bill that included poison pills like:
➡️ limiting DHS ability to send more personnel to the border to handle influx
➡️ cutting overtime pay for BP
➡️ no funding for immigration judges to handle backlog

1143966681930190848.text: Republicans attempted to bring this bill to the floor 17 TIMES & 17 TIMES Democrats blocked the legislation. Meanwhile, Democrats did not offer an alternative of their own to address this humanitarian crisis. After watching the situation escalate for a month...

1143966680579813377.text:
On June 3rd, House Republicans introduced H.R. 3056 in response to the Administration's request for humanitarian aid along the border. 

It included $4.5 billion total
➡️ $3.3B for humanitarian assistance
➡️ $1.1B for operational support
➡️ $178M for law enforcement pay

874674207208202246.text: @ICEgov @RepNewhouse @CustomsBorder @RepCuellar @Scotttaylorva @CongPalazzo @CongCulberson @RepAndyHarrisMD @RepRoybalAllard Thanks for following along while I chaired this important subcommittee hearing! #homelandsecurity

874672893808054272.text: @ICEgov @RepNewhouse @CustomsBorder @RepCuellar @Scotttaylorva @CongPalazzo @CongCulberson @RepAndyHarrisMD @RepRoybalAllard @CongCulberson: "I think we all agree that the starting point is cooperation and sharing information 100% of the time."

874671612435496960.text: @ICEgov @RepNewhouse @CustomsBorder @RepCuellar @Scotttaylorva @CongPalazzo @CongCulberson @RepAndyHarrisMD @RepRoybalAllard @CongCulberson: "all of the laws that we pass are to encourage cooperation...the goal is public safety."

874669306054889472.text: @ICEgov @RepNewhouse @CustomsBorder @RepCuellar @Scotttaylorva @CongPalazzo @CongCulberson @RepAndyHarrisMD @RepRoybalAllard Homan: "it is just as important to tell people what we don't do as it is to tell people what we do."

874669153159872512.text: @ICEgov @RepNewhouse @CustomsBorder @RepCuellar @Scotttaylorva @CongPalazzo @CongCulberson @RepAndyHarrisMD @RepRoybalAllard Homan: "what the men and women of our agencies do is extremely dangerous and is very American."

874666426866561025.text: @ICEgov @RepNewhouse @CustomsBorder @RepCuellar @Scotttaylorva @CongPalazzo @CongCulberson @RepAndyHarrisMD @RepRoybalAllard Homan: we run through a very elaborate system for over-stated visas.

874666049123348480.text: @ICEgov @RepNewhouse @CustomsBorder @RepCuellar @Scotttaylorva @CongPalazzo @CongCulberson @RepAndyHarrisMD @RepRoybalAllard @RepAndyHarrisMD: "what is .@ICEgov doing to find and re-patriot those who have over stayed their visas?"

874664240820477952.text: @ICEgov @RepNewhouse @CustomsBorder @RepCuellar @Scotttaylorva @CongPalazzo @CongCulberson @RepAndyHarrisMD .@RepRoybalAllard: "Part of the reason we are in this situation is because Congress has not done their job."

874663362889736193.text: @ICEgov @RepNewhouse @CustomsBorder @RepCuellar @Scotttaylorva @CongPalazzo @CongCulberson @RepAndyHarrisMD Homan: "you can't say, 'I want to be apart of the greatest country on earth...but I do not want to follow their laws."

874663184325595137.text: @ICEgov @RepNewhouse @CustomsBorder @RepCuellar @Scotttaylorva @CongPalazzo @CongCulberson @RepAndyHarrisMD Homan: "the policies by sanctuary campuses mis-message .@ICEgov. We don't arrest in schools. You don't need a school policy for that."

874662948832235521.text: @ICEgov @RepNewhouse @CustomsBorder @RepCuellar @Scotttaylorva @CongPalazzo @CongCulberson @RepAndyHarrisMD @RepAndyHarrisMD: "Sanctuary universities refuse to work with ICE. Where else is @ICEgov not allowed to go?"

874662631034015746.text: @ICEgov @RepNewhouse @CustomsBorder @RepCuellar @Scotttaylorva @CongPalazzo @CongCulberson @RepAndyHarrisMD Homan: "if you are the victim of a misdemeanor or 'minor crime' it isn't minor. It means something."

874662424326139904.text: @ICEgov @RepNewhouse @CustomsBorder @RepCuellar @Scotttaylorva @CongPalazzo @CongCulberson @RepAndyHarrisMD @RepAndyHarrisMD: "I disagree with people who are going to look the other way who think DWI offenses are 'minor crimes.'

874662117961588737.text: @ICEgov @RepNewhouse @CustomsBorder @RepCuellar @Scotttaylorva @CongPalazzo @CongCulberson @RepAndyHarrisMD Homan: "in my experience, I haven't found that to be true...the rule of law means something to these people (local law enforcement)."

874661854513172481.text: @ICEgov @RepNewhouse @CustomsBorder @RepCuellar @Scotttaylorva @CongPalazzo @CongCulberson .@RepAndyHarrisMD: "do local law enforcement agents dislike interacting with .@ICEgov?"

874660553951764480.text: @ICEgov @RepNewhouse @CustomsBorder @RepCuellar @Scotttaylorva @CongPalazzo .@CongCulberson: "local and state jurisdictions cannot in anyway interfere with federal law enforcement's dealings with illegal immigrants"

874659752248307712.text: @ICEgov @RepNewhouse @CustomsBorder @RepCuellar @Scotttaylorva @CongPalazzo Provost: "they (illegal crossings) are the lowest numbers we have seen in years."

874659641648721920.text: @ICEgov @RepNewhouse @CustomsBorder @RepCuellar @Scotttaylorva @CongPalazzo .@CongCulberson: "just from .@POTUS  enforced direction, illegal crossings have decreased by more than 75%. Is that correct?"

874658989027491841.text: @ICEgov @RepNewhouse @CustomsBorder @RepCuellar @Scotttaylorva @CongPalazzo Carter: "it is dangerous for an officer to approach a residence..in defense of Mr. Homan; I agree with him...God bless you all and thank you

874657268477898755.text: @ICEgov @RepNewhouse @CustomsBorder @RepCuellar @Scotttaylorva @CongPalazzo Provost: "We have apprehended some. That is a top priority for us. We work very closely with @ICEgov to handle hose threats."

874656946049232900.text: @ICEgov @RepNewhouse @CustomsBorder @RepCuellar @Scotttaylorva .@CongPalazzo: "what about foreign nationals...people that want to do us harm, have y'all apprehended any?"

874654367441408002.text: @ICEgov @RepNewhouse @CustomsBorder @RepCuellar @Scotttaylorva Homan: "@ICEgov does not separate families. The perpetrator and the violator splits up his/her family."

874653956093489155.text: @ICEgov @RepNewhouse @CustomsBorder @RepCuellar @Scotttaylorva Homan: "if someone has a DWI, yes. That is an offense worth being removed. If someone has entered illegally that is a federal offense."

874653201156460544.text: @ICEgov @RepNewhouse @CustomsBorder @RepCuellar @Scotttaylorva Provost: "the Steel Bollard wall is our preferred wall of what we currently have in our toolkit; however, we support innovation."

874652828916166656.text: @ICEgov @RepNewhouse @CustomsBorder @RepCuellar .@Scotttaylorva: "is there a standard practice or a desired standard for fencing?"

874651124082647041.text: @ICEgov @RepNewhouse @CustomsBorder @RepCuellar Wagner: "we are looking at new truck screening technology and what exactly is he best technology."

874650880045457409.text: @ICEgov @RepNewhouse @CustomsBorder .@RepCuellar what are your plans to fix the damage done to the port of Loredo (the world trade bridge)?

874649852382195714.text: @ICEgov @RepNewhouse @CustomsBorder Provost: "we are very excited to begin piloting small UASes...we believe these will be very beneficial for our men and women on the ground."

874649558323736580.text: @ICEgov .@RepNewhouse: "how far off we where technology can support immediate @CustomsBorder operations?"

874647488002764800.text: @ICEgov Homan: "...there are no sweeps. There are no raids. I want people to go to church. I want people to go to school."

874647244473081858.text: Homan: "the men and women of .@ICEgov know exactly who they are going to arrest and the exact location of where they will arrest them at...

874643822214615040.text: Homan: "our arrests are up by over 50% are detainers are up by over 75%."

874643628672593923.text: Homan: "I think 51,000 is a good number...we have opened the aperture for who we are looking to arrest, detain, or remove."

874643312971571204.text: .@RepRoybalAllard: "does .@ICEgov have a requirement for the 51,379 detention beds in FY18 and what is that based on?"

874642561394257920.text: Provost: "San Diego, El Paso, and El Centro are the priority areas of old, outdated fencing that need the most attention."

874642249598062594.text: Carter: "where and when will you begin the construction of this replacement fencing and doyou know the exact location?"

874642071113609216.text: Provost: "it is always .@CustomsBorder goal to work with the landowner to find a resolution on those property rights."

874641690174377984.text: Carter: "we pride ourselves in TX on our property rights...we violently fight for our property rights."

874641173784252417.text: Provost: "We are working towards, if we receive the funding, being able to start in March or April in 2018."

874640758841765889.text: Provost: "there are areas where there are natural barriers and here is no requirement for a wall."

874640391680790528.text: Provost: "the Rio Grande valley is a high priority area for us and is an area where we lack a lot of infrastructure."

874640144279752705.text: Carter question to provost concerning infrastructure covering: types of barriers, contractor information and private property laws in TX

874638986798673925.text: Provost: "in its simplest state it is being able to impede and deny entry and having situational awareness until agents can respond."

874638540033929216.text: Provost: "operational control is not new to the @CustomsBorder...we created 'operational control.'

874638125733220353.text: Carter question to Provost: "how do you define the requirements for operational control of the border?"

874637925824303105.text: @JudgeCarter: "we are a current event...we must remember that and must do a serious inquiry."

874637104776704000.text: Homan: "@ICEgov officers don't do what they do out of hate for what's in front, they do it out of love for what's behind them."

874636912610476032.text: Homan: "if a federal judge's decision is not enforced, then there is absolutely no integrity in this entire system."

874636462431580160.text: Homan cont..."they have the right to be proud of the enormous contribution they make to our nation's safety and security."

874636236270575616.text: Homan: "@ICEgov officials have the right to end their shift safely and return to their families everyday....

874634640514011138.text: Wagner: "Last year @CustomsBorder officers inspected over 390 million travelers and arrested over 8,000 individuals wanted for serious crime

874634140548726784.text: Provost: "@CustomsBorder is the finest border security force in the world."

874633813581856770.text: Provost: "it is my belief that @CustomsBorder agents are among the most dedicated and committed law enforcement personnel in America."

874633555061735425.text: Provost: "this budget supports he border patrols dedicated men and women who continue to meet daily challenges with integrity and commitment

874632938088013824.text: Provost: "Nearly 72,000 units of @CustomsBorder radio inventory are obsolete or have exceeded their useful life."

874632436688310272.text: Provost: "@POTUS 2018 fiscal yr budget supports @CustomsBorder commitment to securing our nations borders."
